text:
Have you been to Jesus
for the cleansing power?
Are you washed in the
blood of the Lamb?

Are you fully trusting in
His grace this hour?
Are you washed in the
blood of the Lamb?

Are you washed in the blood,
In the soul-cleansing

blood of the Lamb ?

Are your garments spotless?
Are they white as snow?

Are you washed in the

blood of the Lamb?

Are you walking daily by the
Saviour's side?


Are you washed in the
blood of the Lamb?

Do you rest each moment
in the Crucified?

Are you washed in the
blood of the Lamb?

When the Bridegroom cometh
will your robes be white?

Are you washed in the

blood of the Lamb?

Will your soul be ready for the
mansions bright

And be washed in the

blood of the Lamb.

Lay aside the garments
that are stained with sin
And be washed in the
blood of the Lamb;
Thereâ€™s a fountain flowing
for the soul unclean,
Oh, Be washed in the
blood of the Lamb.
*** Elisha A Hoffman
